item.description:
Gary, says, let's check out McCormick and Schmick's in PARK SQUARE for their Happy Hour Menu. The happy hour prices are valid from 3:30 PM until 6:30 PM, so get there during these times so you don't miss the deal. You must purchase a beverage in order to receive the Happy Hour Menu prices. It's Thursday which is Sushi and Sake night.

******WARNING WARNING WARNING******

******PARK SQUARE location******

The bartenders will shake, stir or muddle a cocktail to your liking. You won't find any blenders at a McCormick & Schmick's bar. There is also an impressive selection of craft-brewed and quality imported beers along with an extensive selection of fine Northwest, California, regional and international wines.

Join fellow drinking buddies for conversation, laughs and good cheap eats. I'll get there at 4 and hang until 8. You're welcome to arrive when you can and hang as long as you're able.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Arlington subway station (green line) is closest, less than a ten (10) minute walk). Chinatown subway station (orange line) is less than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

I'll be wearing a one (1) inch sparkly peace sign sticker on my right shoulder.
item.name: Happy Meal Happy Hour at McCormick & Schmick's
